channel.title: R on Ethan Chan

item.title: Joining Data in R with dplyr
item.description: Introduction This tutorial will teach you how to join different datasets together in R using the “join” functions of the dplyr package by Hadley Wickham. We will be using the nycflights13 package for this exercise, which contains airline on-time data for all flights departing NYC airports in 2013. For further documentation about this package, please see nycflights13. Let’s begin by loading the nycflights13 package and the flights table from nycflights13.
